## Goals of this web report

The maps and charts here highlight general vegetation and land-use trends in the Driftless region, and explore potential areas for restoration of oak-dominated areas.  Additionally we document brief methods.  

![Driftless region hydrography.](docs/images/hydrography.jpg){style="float:right; margin-left: 25px;" fig-alt="\"Rivers and streams of the Driftless region." fig-align="right" width="450" }

Web report developed and deployed by Randy Swaty.  Methods and maps made with substantial input from:

* Ann Calhoun
* Garrett Knowlton
* John Wagner
* August Froehlich
